caption.title: Table of predictor variables (covariates) used in regressions.

tr.td: Ordinal; age groups: 0 to 4; 5 to 14; and 15 and above
Binary; whether an individual participated in MDA or not (at least one full round)
Binary; one if another house member had a clinical episode and 0 if not
Binary; one if another house member had a uPCR-detected infection and 0 if not
Ordinal (split into tertiles); proportion of people within 100 m radius who did not complete all three rounds of MDA
Continuous; average number of bites per person per night
Continuous; 1–26 (from May 2013 through June 2015); included as a control
